popt4jlib.LocalSearch
Interface NeighborhoodFilterIntf

All Known Subinterfaces:
IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf
public interface NeighborhoodFilterIntf

specifies filters for determining "trial" points in the neighborhood of a solution arg, using a "guide" x.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

 java.util.List filter(java.lang.Object x, java.lang.Object arg, java.util.HashMap params)

Method Detail

filter

public java.util.List filter(java.lang.Object x,
                             java.lang.Object arg,
                             java.util.HashMap params)
                      throws LocalSearchException
method will return a List of argument objects to be "tried" so as to "expand" or "shrink" the neighborhood defined around the solution arg. The returned list will contain objects to be tried, based on the "guiding" object x. For example, in a graph packing application, x might be a set of integers to be removed from the current solution arg (that might also be a set of integers), and then, the resulting list will contain all the new integers that can be added to the reduced solution.

Parameters:
x - Object
arg - Object
params - HashMap
Returns:
List
Throws:
LocalSearchException
